column5: You may find this hard to believe but back in the day, (40 years ago maybe) 3lb perch were not that rare. This is before smelt infested Simcoe. When the smelts got there, lake trout started feeding on them instead of perch and the perch got overpopulated and became stunted. Back then, nobody even thought about a world record perch. What? It's a panfish. Do they keep records for them even? Funny today but I actually saw a perch pulled onto the wharf at Beaverton that touched over four pounds. Not by me but the guy next to me and just after I had pulled one in at 3 1/2. Just at iceout in the spring. You may not believe this but I was there and I don't care.

Caught a lot of herring today,but our depth was off.Didn't feel like drilling a bunch more holes in 22" thick ice lol.A lot of Perch caught But this one Perch touch over 1 kg,two scales weighed but you will have to just believe it .lol.Never have caught one this big before.I think it is noteworthy.Sorry about the size,but photo bucket won't let me resize..This was sent to me by cell phone.
Thats a very nice perch!! Looks like a meal for one!!
Nice one.  I call ones like that peacock bass.
Wow! Great fish!!! Is that a 7'1" light action rod? Hahahaha
1 kg????  you mean 1 pound correct? Nice fish though
Big old Simcoe fattie.  We usually tie in to a couple of those every year.
1 kg????  you mean 1 pound correct? Nice fish though 2.3 lbs to be exact,honestly!
2.3 lbs to be exact,honestly! Nice goin.
Wow
Nice fish. Congrats I bet it's full of eggs? Did you measure it? How many inches?
Nice fish. Congrats I bet it's full of eggs? Did you measure it? How many inches? Approx 16".That one was released.Just because it had to be .
Beauty! A 16" perch is a trophy by any means

Beauty! A 16" perch is a trophy by any means Chad,that was the only reason I mentioned a perch.Should of taken that picture with my digital.Thought buddy's phone would let me enlarge it?To much excitement hahaha!Never ever seen one close to that size.I think he sent that to me in text,maybe I can get him to e-mail it and i'll be able to size it properly?Not sure.
beauty fish!  I'm waiting to crack the 2lb mark, would make for a nice replica mount and cheaper than a salmon/other big fish
Looks like a 1lb,that ate a 1lb herring to me.LOL  Thats one big yella belly Dave.

wow, possibly an Ontario record, if you can get the photobucket issues figured out, I'd love to see a better picture, I'm sure some others would too  good on you for letting it go, good karma coming your way      edit, record   White Sucker 5 lbs 6.24 oz 22.8" Lake Joseph Geoff Bernardo 5/23/1996 Yellow Perch 2 lbs 6.72 oz 15.1" Lake Erie Dave Leslie 3/20/2003

wow, possibly an Ontario record, if you can get the photobucket issues figured out, I'd love to see a better picture, I'm sure some others would too  good on you for letting it go, good karma coming your way Chris,hope to have this fixed by tomorrow.The picture deserves better.

Chad,that was the only reason I mentioned a perch.Should of taken that picture with my digital.Thought buddy's phone would let me enlarge it?To much excitement hahaha!Never ever seen one close to that size.I think he sent that to me in text,maybe I can get him to e-mail it and i'll be able to size it properly?Not sure. Yup, emailed photo will be bigger.... for sure ask him to email it to you!
Thank you for doing that. Its a perch of lifetime. I stopped on 14,5" for now.
16?? That is nuuts! Congrats

Sorry guys,looks like the big picture doesn't work for now.A I phone was used to send it to me and it's the first one that won't let me resize even through e-mail or photo bucket.Don't really know what's happening.If I figure it out soon I'll send it.
Hopefully this is better?It's the best I can get.
congratz and wtg on that hog of a perch. pretty dam close in weight for the Ontario record. that would make the perfect mount in my eyes.
Found this pic of a guy with a 15.5" outta lake simcoe recently.  Hawg!
Found this pic of a guy with a 15.5" outta lake simcoe recently.  Hawg!  Must of been our fishes younger brother/sister  lol.Nice pic!!!!!
